choices: Visit his boyfriend and tell him about it
Visit his girlfriend and tell her about it
Visit his best friend and ask their opinion on what to do
1.content:
Sometimes James really pissed Chad off, and today was such a day. The two brothers were twins. They shared almost everything, the same looks, height, and room. Chad was more muscular than James due to the fact that he loved sports while James loved videogames. Chad was bold and adventurous while James was shy and timid.

What had caused James to piss Chad off so bad was a violation of privacy. Chad had money he hid away in their room, and James had dug it up and stole it. Chad had caught him in the act, and James denied snooping in Chad's things. The boys began fighting, and it took both of their parents to sparate them. The boys were both punished, James more severely due to the fact he started the fight to begin with. As soon as he got the Chance, Chad snuck out and decided to explore the countryside to blow off some steam.

"God James, sometimes you really piss me off!" Chad grumbled to himself as he hiked through the medow behind his house. He wasn't sure how he'd sneak back in, but he'd find a way. Suddenly, he tripped and fell down into a hole in the ground. "Agh! What the-- What just happened?!"

He looked around and saw strange patterns on the walls around him. He thought he recognized them from his history class, so he tried to get a better look.

"God I wish I had payed attention in that class! I might be able to recognize these patterns and actually read them!" Luckily there were pictures scratched onto the wall as well, giving Chad a better idea of what this place was.

The pictures seemed to depict a group of people worshipping what appeared to be one of their own. Another picture showed the person being worshipped putting his hands on one of the worshippers. He then appeared to vanish, with the people worshipping this new person. What was all this about?

Next to the pictures was a small shrine of stone with a small, finger sized hole in it. Another inscription above it depicted a person inserting their finger into the hole, so Chad did the same. It was exciting! Being the explorer he was, Chad loved the idea of unearthing a new dicovery!

A surge of energy charged up Chad's hand as he inserted his finger into the hole. He suddenly became...aware. He felt like he knew exactly what had happened and he knew what he could do.

He could do almost anything he wanted!

It was a strange feeling. Its like he was told nonverbally exactly what to do to make anything he wanted to happen occur, and he knew his restrictions. He couldn't kill or change himself. He could change anything else he wanted about anybody or anything in the world!

First, he used his power to get out of the hole. Next, he planned what he wanted to do first. What to do?..
1.title: The Cave's discovery

12.content:
Chad decided that since he could really do whatever he wanted now and get away with it, he decided to skip going straight home and go visit his boyfriend, Luke, instead.

Luke was 15, 5'10'', had curly black hair, and was a little thin. Chad and Luke had met in middle school and began dating when one of their mutual friends told them both about how the other had a crush on them. Luke was similar to James in a few ways. Hhe was shy and had a tendency to blush if he met direct eye contact with someone. He liked to play videogames, but was also sporty. He and Chad were both on thhe school soccer team together. They had both tried for football, but Luke didn't make the cut on account of his size. Luke was more than a boyfriend to Chad, he was a best friend and was happy that both of their parents supported their relationship.

Using his powers to open a wormhole to Luke's home, Chad was at his doorstep in a matter of seconds. He knocked on the door, and Luke answered. "Oh, hey Chad! What's up? Would you like to come in?" Luke asked with a smile. "Sure thing, Luke! I have the craziest thing to tell you." "Well, lets go to the living room and you can tell me there. My parent's aren't home right now, just so you know, so majke sure you don't make a mess!"

The two sat down on Luke's couch as Chad explained what had happened that afternoon. Luke listened, occasionally nodding. "So, hey," he asked when the story finished, "You're like a god now almost?" "Sort of, I guess. I can do whatever I want now. Its bound to be super cool!" "Do something to me! Change me!" "How so? What to you want me to change about you? You know I think you're perfect the way you are!" Chad smiled and Luke blushed bright red. "Yeah, but you know I don't think I'm perfect. Far from it. Could you change something about me and make it so that everyone thinks I was always that way?" "I guess," Chad said, giving in, "What do you ant me to change?" "I want you to make me-"
12.title: Visit his boyfriend and tell him about it

choices: Growing Luke is too much fun; he doesn't want to stop yet.
Go to the mall and people-watch, growing boys they both think are cute.
Try to see if he can change something with city-wide effects.
121.content:
"Taller? How much are we talking about here?" Chad asked, tilting his head slightly.

Luke shrugged, clutching his arm with his other hand. "I dunno. I was thinking about another six inches or so? That would make me the second or third tallest boy in the school, I think."

Nodding, Chad focused his powers on Luke, causing his boyfriend to gradually start inching up, making sure his clothes would grow with him (as much as his instincts urged him to otherwise). He passed six feet, and within fifteen seconds later got to the target height of 6' 4", but Chad continued growing Luke taller, liking what he was seeing so far and not quite wanting to stop.

"Whoa, Chad!" Luke exclaimed, looking down at his arms, legs, and torso that were stretching out before him, and he realized he was getting more than he asked for. "Y-you can stop now!"

Chad obliged, leaving Luke at a height of 6'7". "Now you ARE the tallest boy in the school," he said, grinning. Closing his eyes, he made sure history and everyone's minds were altered so that everyone but the two of them would think that Luke was naturally tall.

"Y-yeah, I guess." Luke rose to his feet, nearly falling over at first, adjusting to his new height. Looking up, he stretched out his arm and easily was able to palm the ceiling, causing him to smile. As he did so, his t-shirt rode up, revealing the same lean stomach that Chad had seen before, just this time a bit bigger than he remembered.

Smiling, Chad reached out from his seated position and hugged Luke around his waist, pressing his face against Luke's stomach. He then stood up and compared his height to his new taller boyfriend, seeing that he only came up to just below his shoulder. "I think that was a good suggestion, Luke."

Luke chuckled, hugging Chad back. "I'm just amazed at how your powers worked! Think of it; we could do anything from here!"

"Yes, I suppose we could!" Chad nodded in agreement, as he thought of how he wanted to test his powers out next.
121.title: Little Larger Luke

1211.content:
Chad had always been a bit of a macrophile, and while Luke was happy with his new size, Chad certainly wasn't. "Are you hungry at all?" Luke asked, "'Cause I could make some sandwiches if you want me to." "Sure!" Chad replied, "That sounds great!" Chad was really just looking for an excuse to get Luke out of the room. As soon as he went into the kitchen, Chad reached into Luke's mind. Not physically, mind you, mentally. He wanted to be certain that Luke was unaware of what Chad was doing.

Chad focused closely on Luke's body, stretching it higher and filling it out as he grew. He didn't make Luke fatter or more muscular, he just filled out his frame so when he finished Luke wouldn't look like a stretched out peice of taffy. That would not be good.

Chad grew Luke until he was about 8 feet tall. Chad made sure to alter reality as well, and noticed that Luke's cielings were now just a bit higher. Chad wasn't quite sure if Luke remembered anything about his powers now, or if it was as if Chad had grown him the first time. He would have to wait and see what sort of effects this new growth had on reality.

Luke walked back in with a grin on his face. "Here you go, little guy!" He said cheerfully. For some reason, Chad found himself blushing. He wasn't sure why, but somehow being called little guy made him feel tingly inside. He loved it!

"So, what do you plan to do with these new powers? Havd you done anything with them yet?" Ok, Luke remembered tgat Chad had powers but didn't remeber Chad growing him earlier. "I don't kbow what I want to do," Chad replied, biting into one of the sandwiches Luke brought in, "How about you decide?" "Ok," Luke said, "Why don't we..."
1211.title: Growing Luke is too much fun; he doesn't wa...

12113.content:
Chad craned his neck as he looked up... way UP... to his giant friend, Luke, how towered over him at 8 feet tall!

"Why don't we go to the park so you can have some fun with your cool new God-like powers!" the giant suggested.

Chad just stared at his big boyfriend with a wide grin. It was getting him aroused seeing Luke so big and small. Of course, Luke had no memory of the fact that Chad had made him grow so big and tall because he had altered reality.

"Okay, we're going to the park... right NOW!" Chad says, as he snapped his fingers, instantly teleporting him and Luke to the park down the street!

There, the two boys spotted two high school kids shooting hoops with two kids in middle school.

Chad just grinned.

"Luke... watch this!" Chad said...

Then...
12113.title: Go to the park

122.content:
"But only about as muscular as you!" Luke said with a mischevious grin. Chad got excited. He loved the thought of Luke growing big. He wanted Luke to be bigger than himself, but Chad knew that he should only do what Luke had asked for.

Focusing on Luke's body, Chad started to make each of his muscles swell. He could sense the position, size, and strength of each one in his mind, as if he was inside of Luke's body. Luke grew to match Chad exactly in size, only Luke was still justa little taller. Both boys now had the same impressive phisique, and Luke should have no trouble getting on all the same sports teams as Chad. Both boys laughed.

"Not so small anymore, huh? Nobody will bother you in school now! Plus, we can easily do everything together now, even sports!" Chad said with glee. "Yeah! Thanks so much, Chad! But, wait. Won't my parents kinda freak out if they saw me like this? In their minds I'm still them same scrawny kid that I was when they left." "That's no problem. Didn't you notice that your clothes grew to fit you? As far as anybody knows, you've always been as strong as I am." Chad smiled. "And I like that." The two boys embraced for a moment. "So what now?" Luke asked curiously.
122.title: More Muscular!

choices: Luke & Brad are now just as muscular

Luke is more muscular than Brad
1221.content:
Chad was proud of his boyfriend's new physique & it was true that not to many men in their high school would be able to push him around as easily anymore. However, there was college.

Luke's older brother was in college & was on the football team and it showed. He had aways pushed his little brother Luke around & easily demonstrated that he could still do so.

"Boy, I wish my brother Brad could not push me around any more," Luke lamented. Chad & Luck both looked at each other knowing it was possible. Chad started to focus. Luke grew more

"Oh, Brad, I want you in here now," Luke called out a few minutes latter. The door slammed open, & there stood big, bad, Brad, glaring in anger that his little brother would call him like that.
1221.title: Luke's older brother walks in

12213.content:
"What?!" Brad demanded. "Just because you might be bigger than me doesn't give you the right to order me around! Remember, I am still older."

"So what?" asked Luke with a smirk on his face. "I can still easily beat you up."

"Maybe you can, but your little boyfriend can't," Brad said as he started to move towards Chad.

Before he could, though, Luke quickly moved in-between them and had Brad on the floor with Luke's foot on his stomach. "What was that, Shrimp?" Luke asked.

"Nothing," Brad said through gritted teeth.

"'Nothing', what?" Luke demanded as he pressed down on his older brother's stomach.

"Nothing, sir." Brad said, glaringly.

:Good, now scram before I give you a pounding!" Luke ordered while flexing his huge arms, causing Brad to scamper out of their as soon as Luke had lifted his foot.

"That was awesome!" Chad said as Luke put one of his arms around his waist and gave him a big kiss.

"I know," Brad said. "What should we do now?"
12213.title: Luke is more muscular than Brad

122131.content:
"How about if we go to the beach," suggested Chad.
"Great idea, little man," said Luke, causing Chad to blush. "I can get Brad to drive us there."
"I could just teleport us there." Chad stated.
"I know, but this will be more fun. Though could you change our clothes to swimsuits?"
"Sure," Chad said before doing so, putting them both in form fitting swimsuits and tank tops.

Upon getting down stairs and finding Brad in theliving room watching TV, Luke said, while flexing his bigger muscles, "Chad and I want to go the beach and you are going to take us or else."
"Fine," said Brad.

When they got there, Luke and Chad stepped out of the car, and Luke ordered Brad to pick them up in a few hours.
Upon laying their towel out, Luke and Chad took off their tank tops, revealing just how bigger Luke really was now, with his chiseled 8-pack abs, large pecks, wide shoulders, arms that had to be at least 24 inches around, and generally making his athletic boyfriend look skinny and weak in comparison.
When Luke caught Chad staring at him, he said "Enjoying the view, little man? Remember, there is more were that came from." Before pulling Chad up against his larger body (how Luke loved that feeling) and giving a deep kiss. When Luke released the kiss, Chad tried to break free from his grip to no avail and said, "What was that?'
"What?" Luke asked. "Did you really think that our positions in our relationship would stay the same now that I am bigger and stronger? I don't think so. From now on, I am in charge."

What does Chad do?
122131.title: Beach

124.content:
"Older?" Chad asked, confused. "Yeah. I'm the youngest person in my house, and even you'll be sixteen in a week while I'm stuk at fifteen for five more months. Please Chad?" "Ok, fine." Chad said, giving in.

Chad formed a mental grip on the span of time around Luke and shot it to the future in a sense. Everything within the temporal bubble he put around Luke would age three years. Chad was certain he saw a few unlucky flies drop after they entered the bubble. Sucks for them.

Chad watched as Luke aged, and was rather impressed. Puberty was extremely kind to him. He grew a good five inches until he was 6'2''. His muscles grew as well, giving him the body of an nfl football player. His face aged as well, giving Luke the looks of a model. Chad was astonished by the changes, and rather pleased too. This hunk was his boyfriend!

"Wow! Look at me man!" Luke exclaimed as he looked at himself in the mirror. He flexed a little. "This is sweet!" "Don't worry about people freaking out about you aging. I also made it so that you were born three years earlier. You now have a license, and you are the star football player at our school. We still met the same way that you remember, and many people are jelous of our relationship. You graduate in two months and will be going to William and Mary, which makes me happy because its only an hour away and I can visit you! Now, since you can drive, where should we go first?"
124.title: Lucky Luke

Chad goes to his friend's house to hang out
Chad stays home and pulls some pranks on James
15.content:
What else to start with? Chad returned home and peeked through the front window. He saw both of his parents in the living room scolding James. Chad went into the minds of both parents and altered their memories to place all the blame on James. Hey, it was his fault in the first place! Now it was like he had never been grounded!

He walked in through the front door and was greeted by his parents. "Im so sorry James was so mean to you sweetie! He'll make it up to you by doing all your chores for a week, right James?" Of course their mother would never punish either of the twins like that. Chad just wanted to be sure James was punished the way he thought James should be.

So Chad relaxed in the boys' room later that evening as James lugged all the laundry from their room on the second floor to the laundry room in the basement. James wasn't very strong, so it was a long, difficult process. Chad started to feel kinda bad for his brother. Sure he deserved it fot being a snoop, but he was still Chad's brother.

As James walked into the room for a third load, Chad made some minor reality changes. He grew James' muscles to slightly smaller than his own, giving him the body of a swimmer. He was no longer struggling to carry the laundry, and Chad could still overpower him if necessary. Plus, no one would notice the difference because Chad rewrote history to make it seem as if James had decided to begin weight lifting a few years back. Chad thought he was succh a saint.

Sure helping his brother was one thing, but what else to do today. The night was young and tomorrow was Saturday, so he could be out as long as he wanyed. Not like anyone could stop him anyway. What to do?..
15.title: Get himself ungrounded!

info.brief_description: A boy falls into an ancient cave and recieves the power to change the world and people.
info.description:
Chad is fifteen. He is about 5'9'', athletic, and has brown hair and brown eyes. He loves to explore, much unlike his twin brother James. The two get along, but could not be more different than each other.

After getting in a small arguement with James one day, Chad decides to go exploring to blow off some steam. During his exploration, he falls into an ancient cave that gives him the powers of the diety that was worshipped there in ancient times. He discovers he now has the power to change anything he wants in the world! The one restriction is that he can't kill with his new power and he can't change anything about himself. How does Chad change his reality? Its up to YOU to decide!

Chad can be whatever you want him to be. Kind, cruel, gay, straight, the only rules for this story are-
1. He cannot change anything about himself
2. He cannot kill people
3. Once a story heads in a particular direction, stay close to the established plot
4. No sex, vore, toilet stuff, or excessive cursing, keep the story to its rating
5. Kissing and intimate stuff is allowed, but don't base entire chapters around it
6. 75 gift points will be given for well written chapters containing at least two long paragraphs. Sorry I can't give out more, I would if I had the funds for it

Have fun!
